abstract: Russia’s migration service said Monday that Robert Dudley, the British chief executive of TNK-BP, was not allowed to work in Russia under his temporary visa. That was seen as increasing the chances that the joint venture’s co-owners, most of whom are Russian, could oust him.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s migration service said Monday that Robert Dudley, the British chief executive of TNK-BP, was not allowed to work in Russia under his temporary visa. That was seen as increasing the chances that the joint venture’s co-owners, most of whom are Russian, could oust him.

headline.main: Chief’s Visa Is New Battleground in TNK-BP Feud
